definition: to sing the high part/to speak fine sounding but empty words (idiom)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
erhua variant of 唱高調|唱高调[chang4 gao1 diao4]

sentences.english: This means you're talking high-sounding words or bushwa.
sentences.chinese: 唱高調就是說大話或者說空話。

sentences.english: The singer can sing high-pitched songs very well.
sentences.chinese: 這位歌手唱高調門的歌唱得非常好。
